narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Easter Seals Southern California INC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Anaheim, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $78.9M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $78.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
